item.title: Pocket Superpower M Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
In Pocket Superpower M , you have to become a Pokemon trainer and fight with various opponents to become the strongest. But at first, you will have only a few Pokemon. To fix this, players will have to progress and earn Diamond Coupons. On the other hand, you can simply use Pocket Superpower M codes.

As with most other mobile games, codes will allow you to get various items and currencies in just a couple of clicks. However, after some time after the release, each code expires, so you should hurry to redeem them.

Updated January 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: New codes may be added very soon, so if you want rewards, you better save this guide. You can always come back to this guide for more freebies.

All Pocket Superpower M Codes

Working Pocket Superpower M Codes

  • FBFOLLOW - Redeem this code to get 10 Diamond Coupon
  • VIP666 - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds
  • VIP777 - Redeem this code to get 10K Gold
  • VIP888 - Redeem this code to get 10 Stone Keystones
  • POCKETDREAM - Redeem this code to get 300 Diamonds and 10 Diamond Coupons
  • POKEMON - Redeem this code to get 200 Diamonds
  • POKEMON666 - Redeem this code to get 2 Diamond Coupons
  • POKEMON777 - Redeem this code to get 10 SSR Poke-Shd Rnd Boxes

Expired Pocket Superpower M Codes

  • 1118VIP

Like in the original Pokemon RPGs, in Pocket Superpower M , each of your pocket monsters can use certain moves. They can be effective against some enemies or extremely weak against others. So, the more Pokemon of different types you have, the easier it will be for you to clear stages. Summoning new units costs Diamond Coupons, which are quite difficult to earn. Fortunately, with the help of Pocket Superpower M codes, you can make your life much easier.

First of all, it is worth noting that each code can contain several rewards, including Diamonds, Gold, and other resources. So, just a few of them will allow you to significantly upgrade your Pokemon team. But of course, the codes are not available all the time. After a certain time after the release, they expire, so you should hurry.

How to Redeem Pocket Superpower M Codes

To use Pocket Superpower M codes, players only need to make a few taps. This feature works just like in most other mobile RPGs. But for convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • Launch Pocket Superpower M .
  • Then, click on your profile icon in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • After that, tap on the Gift Pack button.
  • Next, enter the code and click OK to get all the free goodies.

How to Get More Pocket Superpower M

If you don't want to miss new Pocket Superpower M codes, then you should start following the official page of this free mobile game. There, the developers post all the news, including fresh codes.

  • Pocket Superpower M on the App Store

Pocket Superpower M is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD offers players a survival competition. You have to wander around the map eating different foods to increase your Power and become the strongest GIGACHAD on the server. So, to speed up your growth, you should use Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD codes.

These codes reward players with useful items, such as currencies or boosters. With their help, you will quickly rise in the leaderboard. However, if you do not hurry, the codes will expire and become useless in this Roblox game.

Updated January 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Sometimes game developers delay codes, but we'll update this page as soon as they become available. Fresh updates are just a matter of time.

All Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD Codes

Working Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD Codes

There are no active codes in Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Expired Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD Codes

There are no expired codes in Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD .

Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD gameplay is no different from other io games. All you need to do is gain Power faster than other players. A good way is to beat your opponents, as you will immediately get a large increase in Power. However, it is difficult for players to survive on the map in the early stages. Fortunately, the developers add codes to Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD to make your life a little easier.

Each of the codes contains various rewards that will help you progress faster. However, you should not delay their use, as the codes have a rather short lifespan.

How to Redeem Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD Codes

If you are familiar with other Roblox experiences, then you will easily understand how to use Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD codes. This feature works in a way that is already familiar to players. But if this is your first experience, then follow these simple steps:

  • Launch Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD .
  • Then, open the Shop by clicking on the corresponding button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, scroll left to the end or click on the Code tab.
  • Next, you must enter the code in the box and click the Redeem button to claim free goodies.

How to Get More Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD Codes

In order not to miss new Eat Pizza to Grow GIGACHAD codes, players should visit the official developer page. There, you will find first-hand all the news about the development of updates and events. Moreover, all Roblox codes are first posted on this page.

  • Official Gym io studio Roblox group

item.title: Roblox: Seaside Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Seaside Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Seaside
  • How to Get More Seaside Codes

Seaside is an interesting Roblox game where you can relax while fishing in the evening. Just throw a fishing rod into the pond, and wait for the fish to bite. Then, you have to play a simple mini-game so that it does not break off. You can sell the caught fish and you will also get EXP that will increase your stats.

The merchant has many cool rods, floats, and reels with different properties. They will help you catch better fish, but they are expensive. Fortunately, you can redeem Seaside codes to get in-game currency and many other useful rewards.

Updated January 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are no codes available at this time, but Seaside developers can add them at any time. Stay tuned with this guide so you don't miss any freebies.

All Seaside Codes

Working Seaside Codes

  • No active codes.

Expired Seaside Codes

  • SupaLucky - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • NewMap - Enter this code to get 1,000 Fishbux.
  • ThanksForPlaying - Enter this code to get 1,000 Fishbux.
  • SorryForPingingEveryoneSoMuchPleaseDontHurtMe - Enter this code to get 2,000 EXP.
  • OooShiny - Enter this code to get +20% Shiny Odds for 20 minutes.
  • AlphaRelease - Enter this code to get 1,000 Fishbux, +20% Shiny Odds for 20 minutes, 2x Luck for 20 minutes, and 5 Keys.

Seaside is a fishing simulator, so there is a lot of different equipment that will improve your fishing efficiency. However, to buy it you need to catch and sell hundreds of fish and it takes a lot of time. Therefore, if you want to speed up your progress, you should redeem Seaside codes.

How to Redeem Codes in Seaside

Most Roblox games have a code redemption feature, and it's usually easy to use. The same goes for Seaside , but it can still be difficult for some players to figure out. That said, here is how to redeem codes in Seaside .

  • Open Roblox and launch Seaside .
  • Pay attention to the top left corner of the screen. Press the small three-dash button to access the menu.
  • Next, select the Settings tab.
  • Scroll to the very bottom of the window until you see the Codes section.
  • In the field, paste the code from the list of working codes and press Enter on your keyboard.

As soon as you redeem the code, a message will appear in the lower right corner of the screen with the rewards you have received. If you see a message saying that the code does not exist, check it for extra characters and spaces. Also, codes may simply expire, so redeem them as soon as possible to get your freebie.

How to Get More Seaside Codes

Roblox codes bring players many rewards, so they need to have a reliable source of new and working codes. This guide is one of those sources, and we update it regularly so that you can get all the rewards possible. You can also visit Seaside 's social media pages to find codes there.

  • Seaside X page
  • Seaside Discord server
  • Seaside Roblox group

item.title: Apex Legends' Pathfinder Nerf Controversy Explained
item.description:
Apex Legends ' latest update has the potential to turn the game's fortunes around, but it's got more than a few kinks. One of these issues surrounds a series of nerfs that have severely weakened one of Apex Legends ' most beloved characters.

Apex Legends has been going through tough times recently, with 2024 marking a particularly rocky year. The game went through a massive controversy regarding planned battle pass changes, and its growth hasn't been up to EA's standards. Moreover, many big creators in the Apex community, such as HisWattson, have been immensely critical of the game's decline, citing a lack of innovation and support against widespread issues such as bugs, matchmaking problems, and cheating. Respawn has been making a noticeable effort to address these issues, which many have applauded, but problems like over-monetization and content stagnation remain as bugbears for the community.

Pathfinder's Controversial Nerf In Apex Legends Explained

The last update to hit Apex Legends , despite some hiccups, has had some handy upsides. In particular, the mid-season patch has made some big changes to undersupported Legends like Loba and Mirage, in addition to some great skins and a new hopup—proving Respawn's willingness to make big changes. However, despite some of these changes being well received, one character's gotten the short end of the stick. Pathfinder, a beloved movement Legend, has been nerfed through the floor—the latest in a series of successive nerfs. While it's important that one character doesn't dominate pick-rate as much as Pathfinder has, those who main the Legend are less than amused.

Pathfinder's Season 23 Nerfs

Despite Apex Legends ' season of support, with Season 23 delivering massive buffs to Support Legends, Pathfinder has maintained his high place in the pick-rate. Therefore, Respawn decided to knock the cheerful MRVN down a peg, attaching a flat 30-second cooldown to his grapple ability. Not only is the cooldown a whole 30 seconds, it's no longer variable, meaning even short grapples (or misfired grapples) will incur a long cooldown.

That's not the only way Apex has nerfed Pathfinder with this patch, with his Insider Knowledge perk offering less of a benefit from care package scans. Moreover, Pathfinder's Zipline Zen upgrade has also been greatly weakened; the ability will now only reduce damage by 25%, rather than 50%, when Pathfinder and his teammates are traveling down his Ult's zipline. These are significant decreases, but the knock to his core mechanic is certainly the most devastating—and the effects have been immediate. Since the change was rolled out, Pathfinder's pick-rate dropped 61.67%, though he still maintains a top spot.

Pathfinder's Nerfs Were Unexpected

Pathfinder has always been incredibly popular, offering a movement playstyle that's both thrilling and effective. The character has been buffed and nerfed greatly through the years, with his initial iteration on launch being hugely overpowered, leading to a series of massive nerfs. Pathfinder was eventually brought up to something of a happy medium and, besides some issues with his lacking passive, he's not been the main target of player complaints for some time. Therefore, this nerf has blindsided many Apex players, most of whom didn't mind the character's current place in the meta.

Furthermore, Pathfinder has always had some key drawbacks, and these changes will only make them more dire. He's always suffered from his large hitbox, with no Fortified perk to counter the issue. Moreover, his Passive has been a subject of constant mockery, feeling understated to many despite its efficacy—especially considering Legends like Revenant and Mad Maggie, who effectively have two Passives. These new nerfs likely won't be completely debilitating for Pathfinder, but there's little question that the changes are overkill in the game's current climate.

One Punch Man: The Strongest is a turn-based game based on the popular anime with the same name. This article was created to provide players with codes for the game. The game's developers ensure that One Punch Man: The Strongest codes expire fast, so check below for all of the latest codes and be sure to redeem them before it's too late.

Updated January 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: The developers of One Punch Man: The Strongest periodically add new codes, and we are constantly on the lookout for them. So, as soon as new rewards are available, you will find them here.

How to Redeem Codes in One Punch Man: The Strongest

The process of redeeming codes in One Punch Man: The Strongest is not difficult and is similar to most other mobile games. However, if players still need help, they can follow the step-by-step instructions below:

  • First, launch the game.
  • Then, find and tap on the profile picture.
  • Tap on the Gift Code button.
  • Enter or paste the above-mentioned active code into the appropriate field.
  • Tap Confirm to redeem the code.

One Punch Man: The Strongest Tips and Tricks

  • Choose the Newest Server: Always start on the newest server to stay competitive with others and limit their progress.
  • Level Up Fast: Focus on leveling account quickly by completing daily challenges, aiming for a daily score of 100 for valuable rewards.
  • Smart Stamina Use: Spend stamina wisely on Boss challenges, qualifications, and character evolution materials to maximize rewards.
  • Strategic Gem Spending: Save gems for Limited vouchers to summon powerful limited characters. Prioritize these over other purchases.
  • Team Building: Assemble a balanced team with core characters for energy and survivability, while considering tank units.
  • Gear Up Efficiently: Focus on gear stats over sets, save vouchers until level 78, and use star ascension cards on purple or orange gears.

The Best Mobile Anime Games Like One Punch Man: The Strongest

One Punch Man: The Strongest offers tons of characters and innovative mechanics. However, there are plenty of equally cool anime games that are based on different anime series. With this in mind, those looking to change things up a bit can find five of the best anime games like One Punch Man: The Strongest :

  • Bleach Blood War
  • Outerplane
  • The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross
  • DS - Blade of Hashira
  • One Piece Treasure

About the One Punch Man: The Strongest Developers

One Punch Man: The Strongest is officially authorized by the Japanese production committee and supervised by Shueisha, the publisher of the original manga. The game is developed by PlayCrab, a Chinese game studio that specializes in turn-based strategy and RPG games, and published by FingerFun Limited, a Hong Kong-based game company that focuses on mobile games for the Southeast Asian market.

One Punch Man: The Strongest is available on iOS and Android.
